summary: This new code file, genresforchildren.html, contributes to the system by providing a webpage specifically focused on movie genres for children. The file includes HTML elements for displaying movie posters targeted towards children, along with navigation options for users to access different sections of the application. Additionally, it introduces interactive elements such as a home button and a hamburger menu for easy navigation. The file also includes JavaScript functionality for handling user interactions on the webpage. Overall, genresforchildren.html enhances the user experience by offering a dedicated section for children's movie genres within the larger software system.
